ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( OR( DATEVALUE( End_Time__c )<Customer_Engagement__r.Calendar_Management__r.Start_Date__c , DATEVALUE(End_Time__c)> Customer_Engagement__r.Calendar_Management__r.End_Date__c ), End_Time__c < Start_Time__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End Date is not in the date range of the CE.
